content:
ActiveDirectorySiteCollection Class

Definition

The ActiveDirectorySiteCollection class is a read/write collection that contains ActiveDirectorySite objects.

In this Article

public class ActiveDirectorySiteCollection : System.Collections.CollectionBase
Inheritance
Object
System.Collections.CollectionBase
ActiveDirectorySiteCollection

Properties

Item(Int32)

Gets or sets an ActiveDirectorySite object in this collection.

public System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite this[int index] { get; set; }
index
Int32

The zero-based index of the ActiveDirectorySite object to get or set.

Value
ActiveDirectorySite

The ActiveDirectorySite object that exists at the specified index.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

The member already exists in this collection (applies to set only).

ArgumentNullException

The item specified is null (applies to set only).

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The index specified is out of range of this collection.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySite object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store (applies to set only).

Methods

Add(ActiveDirectorySite)

Appends the specified ActiveDirectorySite object to this collection.

public int Add (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite site);
site
ActiveDirectorySite

The ActiveDirectorySite object to append to this collection.

Returns
Int32

The zero-based index of the ActiveDirectorySite object that is appended to this collection.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentException

The object already exists in this collection.

ArgumentNullException

site is null.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySite object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

Appends the contents of the specified ActiveDirectorySite array to this collection.

The ActiveDirectorySite array that contains the objects to append to this collection.

Exceptions

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentException

The object already exists in the collection.

ArgumentNullException

sites is null.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySite object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

The object already exists in this collection.

sites is null.

InvalidOperationException

Determines if the specified ActiveDirectorySite object is in this collection.

site
ActiveDirectorySite

The ActiveDirectorySite object to search for in this collection.

Returns
Boolean

true if the ActiveDirectorySite object is in this collection; otherwise, false.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentNullException

site is null.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySite object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

CopyTo(ActiveDirectorySite[],Int32)

Copies all ActiveDirectorySite objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.

public void CopyTo (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite[] array, int index);
array
ActiveDirectorySite[]

The array of ActiveDirectorySite objects that receives the elements of this collection.

index
Int32

The zero-based index of array where this method starts copying this collection.

Exceptions
ArgumentException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentNullException

array is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The index specified is out of range of the destination array.

IndexOf(ActiveDirectorySite)

Returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified ActiveDirectorySite object in this collection.

public int IndexOf (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite site);
site
ActiveDirectorySite

The ActiveDirectorySite object to search for in this collection.

Returns
Int32

The zero-based index of the first matching object. Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the ActiveDirectorySite object.

Exceptions
ActiveDirectoryOperationException

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentNullException

site is null.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySite object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

Insert(Int32,ActiveDirectorySite)

Inserts the specified ActiveDirectorySite object into this collection at the specified index.

index
Int32

The zero-based index in the collection where the object is inserted.

site
ActiveDirectorySite

The ActiveDirectorySite object to insert into this collection.

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentException

The object already exists in the collection.

ArgumentNullException

site is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The index specified is out of range of the collection.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySite object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.

Remove(ActiveDirectorySite)

Removes the first occurrence of an object in this collection that is identical to the specified ActiveDirectorySite object.

public void Remove (System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite site);
site
ActiveDirectorySite

The ActiveDirectorySite object to remove from this collection.

Exceptions

A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.

ArgumentNullException

site is null.

InvalidOperationException

The ActiveDirectorySite object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
